entries.text: #0Talk-1st time with lower than either / or 8 Intelligence & Faith
I don't know who you are...But leave me be.
The frailty...of the weak... Disrupts the Dark...
#0Talk-2nd time with lower than either / or 8 Intelligence & Faith
I am interested in one thing. Dark. You haven't the gift.
#0Talk-1st time with both 8 more Intelligence & Faith
I see...The Dark has sparked within you...
I will trade with you. What do you need?
#0Talk-2nd time with both 8 more Intelligence & Faith
#0Talk-3rd time with both 8 more Intelligence & Faith
This land...lies closest to the Dark... Th-that is...that is why I came here.
All that are left... Are either Undead or Hollow...
Save a few misfits like myself...hah hah.
I w-went...I went...I went to a great school...in the south... But neither sorcery nor pyromancy appealed...I...
I-I learned nothing...nothing at all... I-it was there that I happened upon the Dark.
It drew me in... The nebulous Dark...
Soon, I was drawn to this land, where Dark runs deeper than anywhere else.
They were once...a form of sorcery. But the practice was lost...then later rediscovered.
Those devoted to hexes are a lonely lot... But nevertheless...they give their lives to their art.
Such is the fate...of we practitioners of Dark...
What drew me to the Dark...I...I...I do not know.
Hexes ar...are more than mere tools to me...
I feel affinity...and warmth... Something universal, nostalgia...even...
Those who discover Dark...realise this... And...they never come back.
No matter... the time will come...
#0Upon approaching him, after he has previously killed the protagonist
One day...I will share your fate.
#0After reducing his health to 50% or lower
Look...the Dark...I see it...I see it...
